--- title: "Land cover" format: html --- ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-6} **Name:** Land cover **Source:** [Dynamic World](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-022-01307-4) **Version:** 1 **Keywords:** land cover, cropland, forest, water **Type:** Raster **Description:** Dynamic World is a 10m near-real-time (NRT) Land Use/Land Cover (LULC) dataset that includes class probabilities and label information for nine classes. Dynamic World predictions are available for the Sentinel-2 L1C collection from 2015-06-27 to present. **Units:** NA **Available in geocoded GMD?** NA **Available from Space2Stats?** NA ::: ::: {.g-col-6} **Map** ::: {.cell} ::: **Coordinate reference system:** WGS84 (EPSG:4326) **Spatial coverage:** Global **Spatial resolution:** 10 m **Temporal coverage:** 2015-06-27 to present **Temporal resolution:** The revisit frequency of Sentinel-2 is between 2-5 days depending on latitude. **License:** CC BY 4.0 **Citation:** Brown, C.F., Brumby, S.P., Guzder-Williams, B. et al. Dynamic World, Near real-time global 10 m land use land cover mapping. Sci Data 9, 251 (2022). doi:10.1038/s41597-022-01307-4 ::: ::: ::::::: grid ::: {.g-col-lg-8 .g-col-lg-offset-2 .g-col-md-10 .g-col-md-offset-1 .g-col-sm-12 .g-col-12} **Usage:** NA **Limitations:** NA **Examples:** NA **Access:** NA ::: panel-tabset ## R No code ## Output ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "None" ``` ::: ::: ::: **Last updated:** 10/17/25 ::: ::::::: ```{=html}
